name: Block of Failure
description:
Block of Failure is a strategic platformer! With the topic "Failure is Progress" this game was developed in 3 days.


The goal is to get to the top, but some blocks are not filled yet. You have to try to fill them in!
Sometimes you also have to do the opposite to get further!


There are eight stations with different levels of difficulty Can you manage to master all of them?  


What are you waiting for?
Start playing and get to the top!

Enjoy!
